name: UNIFI DeFi
description: UNIFI mission is to make global financial freedom a reality. UNIFI is leading the charge in the DEFI Revolution. To help complete their mission UNIFI will create, the Nitrous Layer (a layer 2 solution to relieve congestion for all chains), the Nitrex platform (complete DEFI platform that allows for staking lending, liquidity providing, and more) and Iris analytics suite (package of industry leading analytics tools).
